task.summary: It's been a long time. How have you been?
Fix memory leak by adding missing iteration in Input. The cause: Removal of key listeners should have been delayed by 4 frames (may change soon) but key listeners were never removed properly.
Set constructor accessibility in GameObject & BlockType Doing that should improve performance by skipping security checks (as the constructors themselves are public anyway).
Fix some block values not being saved
if-then-if to if-else-if; Particle vars saveable
I forgot what I've changed since the last commit.
